17 Apr 2025

Twisted Hearts Club: 6 Romance Books for Those Who Loved the Chaos of You

If you couldn’t look away from the romantic wreckage of You, or found yourself rooting for love stories that should come with a warning label, we’ve got six brand-new reads that will feed your dark little heart. From psychological tension to toxic devotion, these twisted romances will leave you breathless — and maybe questioning your taste in fictional partners (don’t worry, we’re not judging).

Love & Other Cures For the Recently Undead

by HJ Ramsay

Release Date: February 20 2025

H.J. Ramsay explores the aftermath of a zombie apocalypse when a cure has been discovered. Diving into trauma on a massive scale, Ramsay delves into the relationships we form while healing and rebuilding hope in a struggling society.

Buy on Amazon

Sweet Sinners

by N.D. Roldan

Release Date: March 27 2025

He took everything from her. Now, he’s the only thing she craves. Cali never expected stepping into her family’s empire would mean confronting Connor—the stepbrother accused of their parents’ murders. Now he’s back, under her roof, under her skin, and dangerously off-limits. Enemies. Off-limits. Lovers.

Buy on Amazon

Theodora

by Summer Cassel

Release Date: March 15 2025

When Theo travels to Scotland, she seeks adventure—not Iain, the darkly handsome man she shouldn’t want. Because she’s married. But stolen moments lead to secrets, and now she must choose: the life she built or the one tempting her to risk everything.

Buy on Amazon

Bridesmaid by Chance

by Meghan Quinn

Release Date: April 15 2025

It’s an instant no from Hudson at first, but when she convinces him that no one will find out, including her brother, and points out how he will benefit from the marriage too…well, Hudson might just find himself saying “I do.”

Buy on Amazon

My Dark Fairy Tale (My Dark Mafia Romance)

by Giana Darling

Release Date: April 8 2025

When a mysterious man rescues her from near death, a young woman finds herself in the throes of a dark and dangerous storybook romance, where pleasure reigns but happy endings are no guarantee.

Buy on Amazon

Dark Rebel’s Fortune (The Children Of The Gods Paranormal Romance Book 94)

by I. T. Lucas

Release Date: April 12 2025

After decades as a freedom fighter with nothing to lose, Kyra has finally found what’s worth living for—a daughter she can’t remember, a family who needs her protection, and a connection with Max.

Buy on Amazon
